description: This file defines a utility class PathUtils that provides static methods to retrieve various filesystem paths used within the system, such as config directories, cache paths, bin paths, and system paths. It handles system property overrides and provides default values for these paths.

classes.name: PathUtils
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods to manage filesystem path configurations, including defaults and system property overrides.

methods.name: getDynamicConfigPath
methods.description: Returns the path for dynamic configuration files, using system property overrides if set.

methods.name: getStaticConfigPath
methods.description: Returns the path for static configuration files, using system property overrides if set.

methods.name: getBrandDefaultsPath
methods.description: Returns the path to the brand's default configuration directory.

methods.name: getSystemBinPath
methods.description: Returns the system binary directory path, with a default fallback.

methods.name: getSystemEtcPath
methods.description: Returns the system etc directory path, with a default fallback.

methods.name: getTempPath
methods.description: Returns the temporary directory path, with a default fallback.

methods.name: getDynamicCachePath
methods.description: Returns the cache directory path for dynamic cache files.

methods.name: getDynamicBinPath
methods.description: Returns the directory path where dynamic bin files are stored.

methods.name: getDynamicSBinPath
methods.description: Returns the directory path where dynamic sbin files are stored.

methods.name: getDynamicPath
methods.description: Returns the base dynamic path for the system.

methods.name: getStaticPath
methods.description: Returns the static path for the system.

methods.name: getForcedTroubleDirname
methods.description: Returns the path to the forced trouble directory, specific to Android.
